00046 struct Place_State {
00047 
00048   fred::Spin_Mutex mutex;
00049   std::vector< Person * > susceptibles;
00050   std::vector< Person * > infectious;
00051 
00052   void add_susceptible( Person * p ) {
00053     fred::Spin_Lock lock( mutex );
00054     susceptibles.push_back( p );
00055   }
00056 
00057   void clear_susceptibles() {
00058     fred::Spin_Lock lock( mutex );
00059     susceptibles.clear();
00060   }
00061 
00062   size_t susceptibles_size() {
00063     fred::Spin_Lock lock( mutex );
00064     return susceptibles.size();
00065   }
00066 
00067   std::vector< Person * > & get_susceptible_vector() {
00068     return susceptibles;
00069   }
00070 
00071   void add_infectious( Person * p ) {
00072     fred::Spin_Lock lock( mutex );
00073     infectious.push_back( p );
00074   }
00075 
00076   void clear_infectious() {
00077     fred::Spin_Lock lock( mutex );
00078     infectious.clear();
00079   }
00080 
00081   size_t infectious_size() {
00082     fred::Spin_Lock lock( mutex );
00083     return infectious.size();
00084   }
00085 
00086   std::vector< Person * > & get_infectious_vector() {
00087     return infectious;
00088   }
00089 
00090   void clear() {
00091     susceptibles.clear();
00092     infectious.clear();
00093   }
00094 
00095   void reset() {
00096     if ( susceptibles.size() > 0 ) {
00097       susceptibles = std::vector< Person * >();
00098     }
00099     if ( infectious.size() > 0 ) {
00100       infectious = std::vector< Person * >();
00101     }
00102   }
00103 
00104 };
00105 
00106 struct Place_State_Merge : Place_State {
00107 
00108   void operator() ( const Place_State & state ) {
00109     fred::Spin_Lock lock( mutex );
00110     susceptibles.insert( susceptibles.end(), state.susceptibles.begin(), state.susceptibles.end() );
00111     infectious.insert( infectious.end(), state.infectious.begin(), state.infectious.end() );
00112   }
00113 
00114 };

00532   // Place Allocator reserves chunks of memory and hands out pointers for use
00533   // with placement new
00534   template< typename Place_Type >
00535   struct Allocator {
00536     Place_Type * allocation_array;
00537     int current_allocation_size, current_allocation_index;
00538     int number_of_contiguous_blocks_allocated, remaining_allocations;
00539     int allocations_made;
00540 
00541     Allocator() {
00542       remaining_allocations = 0;
00543       number_of_contiguous_blocks_allocated = 0;
00544       allocations_made = 0;
00545     }
00546 
00547     bool reserve( int n = 1 ) {
00548       if ( remaining_allocations == 0 ) {
00549         current_allocation_size = n;
00550         allocation_array = new Place_Type[ n ];
00551         remaining_allocations = n; 
00552         current_allocation_index = 0;
00553         ++( number_of_contiguous_blocks_allocated );
00554         allocations_made += n;
00555         return true;
00556       }
00557       return false;
00558     }
00559 
00560     Place_Type * get_free() {
00561       if ( remaining_allocations == 0 ) {
00562         reserve();
00563       }
00564       Place_Type * place_pointer = allocation_array + current_allocation_index;  
00565       --( remaining_allocations );
00566       ++( current_allocation_index );
00567       return place_pointer;
00568     }
00569 
00570     int get_number_of_remaining_allocations() {
00571       return remaining_allocations;
00572     }
00573 
00574     int get_number_of_contiguous_blocks_allocated() {
00575       return number_of_contiguous_blocks_allocated;
00576     }
00577 
00578     int get_number_of_allocations_made() {
00579       return allocations_made;
00580     }
00581 
00582     Place_Type * get_base_pointer() {
00583       return allocation_array;
00584     }
00585 
00586     int size() {
00587       return allocations_made;
00588     }
00589   }; // end Place Allocator
00590 
00591 };
